quadrants.title: No Code Platform & Builders
quadrants.description: Pure no-code solutions, where one can build applications or websites without writing (or almost without writing) code.

quadrants.title: Low Code Platforms & Rapid Applications Development
quadrants.description: Platforms that offer a "visual" or "semi-visual" experience, but allow for the injection of custom code for more advanced cases.

quadrants.title: Low code related open-source solutions (CMS, Frameworks, ERP, etc.)
quadrants.description: Open-source building blocks that simplify or accelerate development, sometimes considered as "low-code" since you don't start from scratch.

quadrants.title: Automation & Integration
quadrants.description: Focus on vertical solutions that automate or connect services, often through visual flows (no-code) or minimal configuration.
